row.process:
:IF &ENVI# = "PRD" : set &final_url_sharepoint#="http://&TITRE_SHAREPOINT#.&DNS_DCP_ZONE#" :else : set &final_url_sharepoint#="http://&TITRE_SHAREPOINT#-&ENVI#.&DNS_DCP_ZONE#" :ENDIF
:SET &RC1# = SEND_MAIL("exploitation.windows@cofelyineo-gdfsuez.com",,"Fermeture du ticket : Criation du Sharepoint &TITRE_SHAREPOINT# N0&REQUEST_NUMBER#","Bonjour, Merci de fermer la demande de criation de Sharepoint n0 &REQUEST_NUMBER#. Lien URL: &final_url_sharepoint#",,,) :P SEND_MAIL("exploitation.windows@cofelyineo-gdfsuez.com",,"Fermeture du ticket : Criation du Sharepoint &TITRE_SHAREPOINT# N0&REQUEST_NUMBER#","Bonjour, Merci de fermer la demande de criation de Sharepoint n0 &REQUEST_NUMBER#. Lien URL: &final_url_sharepoint#",,,)
